properties.name: Application Origin
properties.desc: This application origin is used to determine an origin coordinate used for all calculations.  On write, some modules allow you to not trnaslate this back, in which case, this becomes a local origin point of the output generated.

properties.name: Viewer Snapshot
properties.desc: Save a snapshot of the contents of the primary viewer.

properties.name: Application Snapshot
properties.desc: Save a snapshot image of the contents of the Application window.

properties.name: Application Information
properties.desc: Information usable throughout the application for titles and other strings. Date Format is the python style date format used to format {Today}.
